segments.text: The performance is amazing . I'm curious about how they did it . I mean the way they sing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They must have practiced a lot . The perseverance has made them they are today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So cool . Someone gave me this flier at the exit . What's it about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me have a look . Well , it lists some shows that will be on next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , tell me about it . Anything interesting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... Oh , this one , ' The Drunken Beauty ' . This is a real classic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ' The Drunken Beauty ' ? It's funny that we have ' Sleeping Beauty ' in my country . Anyway , what's it about ? Is the beauty a drunkard ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . She was said to be the most beautiful woman in her time and that made her become the queen . They play was famous for its singing and dancing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , people do that when they are drunk . What about the actress ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is an opera star in China . Her teacher's teacher is Mei Landfang .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I've heard about him before . He even created a special dance of sleeve shaking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are such an expert on it . I don't know that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , interest is the best teacher .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , want me to book the tickets again ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please do that . I can't wait to come back again . The performance must be really amazing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can do that if you like . Maybe next weekend .
segments.speaker: S2
